this game looks awesome plus a lot smaller than the other one.. of course i still have to finish Risen and Dragon Age: Origins.... on top of my goddman homework....

Ok setup does not seem to be deleting compressed files after installation (funny, it was working fine before i uploaded it). After installation just go to data\Win32\packed and delete all .tptb files.. The current folder should then be 5.8gb in size..
hey dude seed plz.. i don't usually say this for slow dl speed but everyone is stuck at 45%....
This one doesn't have the endless loading time? There's no point posting all these torrents if non of them work :/
he keeps asking to place original cd... any answers??

first of all thanks to TPTB for the realease of another great game!

about the releases of this game, last spring the german version was released in germany, at 3 november the first english version was released in australia and at 5 January of 2010 it will be released again worldwide...

on to this torrent, the latest release had the wide problem of the neverending loading screen (at game start and further on to the game, dua do as it seems random anti-piracy implemented cd-checks), and no fix has been found yet...
has anyone playing this rip stumbled upon the bad loading screen?

when I start to play a game (after cut-scene) there is a black screen...only thing I see is inventory and voices...

win7 32-bit
updated physx & gf8600gts drivers
some1 have this problem?
yup this has a never ending load screen right after the movie where you see a big ship. can someone please fix!
so has anyone been able to get this version of the game to work?

ive downloaded this version and the reloaded and neither seem to work. do everything im told down to the letter and im still getting the fuckin infinite load times. shit this game is harder to play than dragon age.

AMD Athlon 9tm0 Processor LE - 1649 2.70GHZ

hi please can u help me chatbars i have winxp but when i run setup.exe select my folder and press (i) for install it copy but i took screen shoot and it says Freeman_1.tptb-Freeman_7.tptb but i have all this files and when it install it create folder named tptb and this folder have like 20.7mb why? thanks for reply
hi for me the setup.bat cant extract the game :( pls help

The setup isn't extracting the game. You'll see the file load up the word "FREEMAN" slowly top to bottom, and then it flashes info for a quick sec and does it again (7x for the 7 .tptb files). Afterwards it'll say "Sweet!" etc. as if the installation was finished. Game Directory is a whopping 21.5MB.
I've extracted the original download with Winrar, 7-zip, and Freearc with the same results, also forced the torrent to re-check files. No success... any Solution?
